page.title: 07 T.V. & RADIO SURVEY
page.content: A cross section of the residents of Faversham were asked about their viewing and listening habits and their programme preferences.The most popular type of programme for radio and T.V. were comedy shows followed by chat shows.Of the soap operas we found that people liked Dallas and the Eastenders more than any others.Lots of people, not only children,watch childrens programmes.The most popular viewing day appears to be Saturday.Evening television programmes are far more popular than morning T.V.Other popular types of programmes are music,plays and phone-ins.BBC1 was chosen as the most popular channel.The radio is listened to mostly in the early morning and sometimes in the evening.People commonly listen to the radio when they are bored or when they are working. Radio LAZER 558 is quite popular.
